## Vector3.minimizeInPlaceFromFloats() method

Updates the current Vector3 with the minimal coordinate values between its and the given coordinates

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
minimizeInPlaceFromFloats(x: number, y: number, z: number): Vector3;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | <code>number</code> | defines the x coordinate of the operand |
|  y | <code>number</code> | defines the y coordinate of the operand |
|  z | <code>number</code> | defines the z coordinate of the operand |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Vector3`

the current updated Vector3
